long_description: Ready to go any distance, the second generation ASICS GT-2000 2 Road-Running Shoes are even lighter weight and more comfortable than before to keep you comfortable on your long runs. Uppers are made of lightweight, flexible polyester mesh and synthetic textile to offer breathability and comfort. Wicking polyester linings move excess moisture away from feet and dry fast. FluidRide midsoles provide a combination of bounce back and cushioning without adding cumbersome weight. Dual-density midsoles enhance stability and support to provide smooth overpronation control. Molded Trusstic System(R) under the midfoot area provides stability to help control torsion while you're running. Forefoot and rearfoot GEL(R) silicone-based cushioning inserts absorb excess shock in all directions for great stability. Nylon plates offer torsional rigidity and lightweight support. High-performance blown rubber outsoles have abrasion-resistant material in the heels and forefoot material that cushions and increases traction and feel. Vertical flex groove in outsoles follows the line of progression throughout the gait cycle to enhance gait efficiency. ASICS GT-2000 2 Road-Running Shoes are ideal for neutral runners and slight overpronators.
short_description: Ready to go any distance, the second generation ASICS GT-2000 2 Road-Running Shoes are even lighter weight and more comfortable than before to keep you comfortable on your long runs.
